name: Engine Calamity
description:
All you need is a mouse! Click to start a level. Guide each train to their color corresponding stations, either by switching tracks or avoiding trains. Best of luck!

Train Crisis is a puzzle strategy in which you have to guide trains with a different color each towards their corresponding destination. Dodge obstacles and test your skills in 4 distinct historical settings such as the Industrial Revolution, the Far West, the Modern era and the Future.

- Train Crisis' Steam Page, created by U-Play Online
